hints.content:
To find the total amount of lemon juice, we add the number of $\text{mL}$ she squeezed from the first lemon $(\blueD{42} \text { mL})$ and the second lemon $(\maroonD{36} \text { mL})$.

[[☃ image 1]]

options.alt: Two rectangles sit on top of each other. The top rectangle is labeled with a question mark. A curved bracket across the top rectangle is labeled Total volume. The bottom rectangle is divided into 2 parts. The longer left part is labeled 42 milliliters. The shorter right part is labeled 36 milliliters. A curved bracket across the longer left part of the bottom rectangle is labeled First lemon. A curved bracket across the shorter right part of the bottom rectangle is labeled Second lemon. !

hints.content: Li Min squeezed $\greenD{78}\text { mL}$ of lemon juice from her $2$ lemons.

question.content:
Li Min squeezed $2$ lemons to make lemonade.  She squeezed $42$ milliliters of lemon juice from the first lemon and $36$ milliliters of juice from the second lemon.

**How much lemon juice did Li Min squeeze from her $2$ lemons?**  

[[☃ input-number 1]] milliliters
